name: SD Gundam Gaiden Knight Gundam Monogatari: Entaku no Kishi-dan
storyline: It is a Suda Doaka World, which is said to be somewhere in a different era from the present day. In this world, humans and MS lived peacefully. In the past, there was a kingdom ruled by the MS King "King Gundam" in this land. After a long period of peace, the "Knights of the Round Table," the pride of the kingdom, set out on their own journeys of exploration...
summary: SD Gundam Gaiden Knight Gundam Monogatari: Entaku no Kishi-dan is a Role-Playing game, published by Bandai
